titles: Cantus The first set of madrigals, of 3.4.5.6.7.8. parts for viols and voices, or for voices alone, or as you please. Composed by Robert Iones.
First set of madrigals, of 3.4.5.6.7.8. parts.
author: Jones, Robert, fl. 1597-1615.
notes: In 2 parts; Cantus and Bassus. Bassus begins new register.
Signatures: A²  B-D⁴ E² ; A²  B-D⁴ E² .
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
